home.rest: I'm a web developer, focused on JavaScript and Node. I'm looking for work as a Junior dev, in Wroclaw or remotely.

education.title: Education
education.text: I've been passionate about computers since I was little, which pushed me to attend professional technical school. Graduation granted me "Certificate of competence, an IT technician", but unfortunately school only taught me the basics, so I've been learning on my own ever since.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: I like learning new things and gaining experience. I'm honest and earnest in my work. I have English certificate on B2 level, so I don't have any problems understanding documentation and handling communication. I'm best with JavaScript (and Node), I also use Vue. I'm able to create site structure (HTML + CSS), but it doesn't always show as I tend to put too much focus on Back-end (or get distracted by new projects). I know SQL (sqlite), basics of Webpack and nginx. Currently I'm learning SASS and React.

other.title: Other
other.text: My other hobbies include gaming and cinematography. I really like competing with other players in multiplayer games like Dota2 and Counter-Strike. I've even participated in couple amateur tournaments (with various success). As for movies I not only enjoy watching them but I am also interested in the logistics behind them. My favourite movie is probably The Grand Budapest Hotel, for its perfect mix of humor and action.

projects.desc: List of all other projects I've done so far

list.title: TERA data parser (unfinished)
features: Serve that data as a table

404: Whoops, you weren't supposed to end up here. I suggest going back, currently it's as empty as space behind us.
